name: Persistent Outlook Landing Pages
description: Detects the manipulation of persistent URLs which can be malicious
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:(/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Ww][Ee][Bb][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]\\.*/) AND registry.path:/.*\\[Uu][Rr][Ll]/ AND registry.path:(/.*\\[Cc][Aa][Ll][Ee][Nn][Dd][Aa][Rr]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ii][Nn][Bb][Oo][Xx]\\.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:(*\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\* OR *\\Outlook\\WebView\\*) AND registry.path:*\\URL AND registry.path:(*\\Calendar\\* OR *\\Inbox\\*))`
